publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2593 Ian Jenkins: Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Borders-That the Parliament commends the work of Chernobyl Children Life Line, which offers medical help and holidays to young victims of on-going radioactive contamination in Belarus; welcomes the formation of a link between this national charity and the Scottish Borders, and applauds its efforts to bring groups of youngsters to the Scottish Borders for a restorative and life-enhancing stay in Scotland.

S1M-2593 Ian Jenkins: Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Bordersâ€”That the Parliament commends the work of Chernobyl Children Life Line, which offers medical help and holidays to young victims of on-going radioactive contamination in Belarus; welcomes the formation of a link between this national charity and the Scottish Borders, and applauds its efforts to bring groups of youngsters to the Scottish Borders for a restorative and life-enhancing stay in Scotland. Supported by: Christine Grahame*
S1M-2593 Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Borders (lodged on 10 January 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2593 Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Borders (lodged on 10 January 2002) Michael Russell*, Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*

S1M-2593 Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Borders (lodged on 10 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2593 Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Borders (lodged on 10 January 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-2593 Chernobyl Children Life Line Link with the Scottish Borders (lodged on 10 January 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
